about_the_game:
ME:

Ninja: Shadow of the Dash is a speedrunner. Just speedrun the whole game as fast as you can. You can train each Level in the Training mode but all levels together make up the actual Game. And there is a Hardcore mode where you have to restart at Level 1 if you die. But most fun is the normal game mode and trying to beat the whole game in a very fast time makes a lot of fun (it is fr, trust me, just buy the game). So it's basically all about speedrunning.

ChatGPT:

Overview:

Ninja: Shadow of the Dash is a fun 2D speedrun platform game. The goal is to finish the game as fast as you can. Your only enemy is yourself as you race against the clock.

Gameplay:

Move quickly and react fast. Each passage needs good timing and precise moves. Jump, dash, and sprint to beat the game.

Challenge:

Ninja: Shadow of the Dash is very hard. It needs dedication and practice. Only the best gamers can master the game and finish the hardest levels quickly.

Features:

- Fast-Paced Action: Enjoy exciting levels that make you move quickly.

- Precise Controls: Easy-to-use controls let you jump and dash perfectly.

- High Difficulty: The game is challenging and will test your skills.

- Self-Competition: Try to beat your best times again and again.

- Addictive Gameplay: The mix of speed and challenge makes the game fun and replayable.

Are you ready to test your skills and become the ultimate speedrunner? Play Ninja: Shadow of the Dash and find out!
